Melissa A. Rodgers is a quantitative researcher at the [American Institutes for Research](https://www.air.org/). She completed her doctoral work in the Quantitative Methods program within the Educational Psychology Department at The University of Texas at Austin. Her research interests include meta-analysis, selective reporting detection tests and adjustment methods, and handling dependent effects in meta-analysis. She is also
